content: I completely agree. ensuring that technology is accessible and affordable to farmers of all sizes is crucial for creating a sustainable and equitable agriculture industry for everyone. we should continue to explore innovative ways to develop technology that can help farmers improve their productivity, enhance their sustainability practices, and ultimately, increase their profits. at the same time, we should also ensure that smaller farmers and rural communities are not left behind in the process of technological advancements. governments, industry leaders, and community organizations should work together to build an inclusive technology framework that prioritizes the needs of all farmers and promotes equitable access to technology.
